pkgmetadata.longdescription: Search and Download Satellite Imagery using the SkyWatch API // Query and download satellite imagery and climate/atmospheric datasets using the SkyWatch API. Search datasets by wavelength (band), cloud cover, resolution, location, date, etc. Get the query results as data frame and as HTML. To learn more about the SkyWatch API, see https://github.com/skywatchspaceapps/api.
